greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of pseudoperfect (or semiperfect) numbers.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Semiperfect Number
program: a210455 n = fromEnum $ p (a027751_row n) n where
p ks m = m == 0 || not (null ks) && head ks <= m &&
(p (tail ks) (m - head ks) || p (tail ks) m)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 21 2013
